Record Group 11. Print matter (1881-2017; 79.25 linear feet)

The Moral Instruction of Children, by Felix Adler, 1902. Training Children to Study, by Bessie W. Stillman, 1928. The Passing of the Recitation, by V.T. Thayer, 1928. Reorganizing Secondary Education, by V.T. Thayer, Caroline B. Zachry, and Ruth Kotinsky, 1939. Creative Drama in the Lower School, by Corinne Brown, 1929. American Education Under Fire, by V.T. Thayer, 1944. Remedial Training for Children with Specific Disability in Reading, Spelling, and Penmanship: Part Two Remedial Procedures, by Anna Gillingham and Bessie W. Stillman, 1946. A Spelling Curriculum, by Sally B. Childs, 1955. Remedial Training for Children with Specific Disability in Reading, Spelling, and Penmanship, by by Anna Gillingham and Bessie W. Stillman, 1956.
